about_the_game:
Enjoy the joyfully bouncy Original Bamerang Soundtrack by Lucien Guy Montandon!

Check out Bamerang the game!



"Finding the aesthetics for the Bamerang soundtrack was a challenging and enjoyable experience. I imagined those characters making music at the end of a long fight. How would their music sound and what kind of instruments do they play? There is a bit of an organic-esoteric influence, which stands for the culture of the characters.
And there is the world, which is very colourful, and that brought the pop in. I think those were the main keyframes during the production and composing process.
I hope it will fit for the listeners when they play the game or when they are listening to the soundtrack."
- Lucien Guy Montandon

Minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space
